cleaned_text: Battle Lichen Planus with Homeopathy Lichen planus is a skin condition that is characterized by non-infectious, itchy rashes on the legs and the arms. It consists of many-sided, small, flat-topped, purple, or pink bumps. People who have Hepatitis C are more susceptible to lichen planus. Symptoms of lichen planus Some of the common symptoms of lichen planus are as follows - - Intense itching - Rashes - Flat-topped bumps - White streaks - Papules - Appearing of rashes abruptly - Possible redness of the skin - Sore mouth ulcers - Dry mouth These symptoms of lichen planus should not be ignored and you should consult a doctor on an immediate basis. Causes of lichen planus Lichen planus occurs when your immune system attacks the skin cells or the mucous membranes. Lichen planus can be triggered by - - Flu vaccine - Hepatitis C - Pain relievers - Certain medications for heart diseases - Certain pigments, metals, and chemicals Anyone can develop this condition but most often it affects middle-aged adults and therefore it is always advisable to consult your doctor for the right treatment procedure.
